message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.FL, cs.CL

The paper presents a new fuzzy logic programming language that integrates and extends features from existing fuzzy logic languages. It focuses on managing similarity and truth degrees, which are important concepts in artificial intelligence and logic programming. Therefore, cs.AI and cs.LO are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also discusses the syntax and operational semantics of the language, which suggests that it belongs to cs.PL (Programming Languages). Additionally, the paper mentions the lattice module and similarity module, which are related to fuzzy logic and similarity, respectively, indicating that cs.FL (Fuzzy Logic) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are also possible sub-categories.
